catfolk.name: Catfolk

racial_traits.name: Claws
racial_traits.description: Catfolk possess natural claw attacks that can be used as primary natural weapons.

racial_traits.name: Agile Grace
racial_traits.description: Their natural agility grants them bonuses on Acrobatics and Stealth checks.

racial_traits.name: Keen Senses
racial_traits.description: Catfolk have heightened senses, giving them a bonus on Perception checks.

catfolk.description: Catfolk are agile, curious, and charismatic small humanoids with feline grace. They excel in acrobatics and stealth, and their natural claws make them formidable in unarmed combat.

duergar.name: Duergar

racial_traits.name: Psionic Resilience
racial_traits.description: Duergar have inherent psionic abilities and resist magic that would induce sleep.

racial_traits.name: Invisibility
racial_traits.description: They can turn nearly invisible for brief periods, especially in darkness.

racial_traits.name: Stonecunning
racial_traits.description: Duergar detect unusual stonework and hidden doors in stone with uncanny accuracy.

duergar.description: Duergar are grim, dour dark dwarves of the Underdark known for their psionic abilities, stealth, and relentless survival in hostile underground environments.

gnoll.name: Gnoll

racial_traits.name: Ferocity
racial_traits.description: Gnolls are naturally savage, gaining bonuses on Intimidate checks and combat maneuvers that rely on sheer aggression.

racial_traits.name: Bite Attack
racial_traits.description: Gnolls have a natural bite attack that deals damage based on their size.

gnoll.description: Gnolls are bestial, hyena-like humanoids renowned for their physical prowess, savage nature, and intimidating presence in battle.

grippli.name: Grippli

racial_traits.name: Amphibious
racial_traits.description: Grippli can breathe both air and water, and they gain a swim speed.

racial_traits.name: Natural Acrobatics
racial_traits.description: Their frog-like bodies grant them bonuses on Jump and Acrobatics checks.

grippli.description: Grippli are small, frog-like humanoids adept at navigating swampy terrain. Their amphibious nature and agility make them excellent climbers and swimmers.

goblin.name: Goblin

racial_traits.name: Trapfinding
racial_traits.description: Goblin characters gain bonuses on Perception checks to find traps and on saving throws against trap effects.

racial_traits.name: Feral Agility
racial_traits.description: Their natural quickness gives them bonuses on Acrobatics and Stealth checks.

goblin.description: Goblins are small, quick, and chaotic humanoids known for their ingenuity in setting and disarming traps, as well as their unpredictable, explosive nature.

hobgoblin.name: Hobgoblin

racial_traits.name: Military Discipline
racial_traits.description: Hobgoblins are trained warriors who gain bonuses on tactical and weapon proficiency checks.

racial_traits.name: Organized Tactics
racial_traits.description: Their disciplined nature grants them bonuses on teamwork and leadership in combat.

hobgoblin.description: Hobgoblins are the disciplined, militaristic cousins of goblins. They emphasize organization, training, and tactical prowess, making them excellent soldiers and tacticians.

ifrit.name: Ifrit

racial_traits.name: Fire Affinity
racial_traits.description: Ifrits have a natural connection to fire, granting them fire resistance and innate spell-like abilities related to fire.

racial_traits.name: Fiery Temperament
racial_traits.description: Their volatile nature can grant situational bonuses in combat when their emotions run high.

ifrit.description: Ifrits are beings of elemental fire, known for their intense passion and innate magical abilities centered on fire. Their volatile nature is both a strength and a potential liability.

kobold.name: Kobold

racial_traits.name: Trapfinding
racial_traits.description: Kobolds are exceptionally skilled at noticing and disarming traps.

racial_traits.name: Sneaky and Cunning
racial_traits.description: Their clever nature grants them bonuses on Stealth and other Dexterity-based checks.

kobold.description: Kobolds are small, reptilian humanoids known for their trapmaking and ambush tactics. Their cunning and affinity for dragons make them both clever and dangerous in large numbers.

lizardfolk.name: Lizardfolk

racial_traits.name: Natural Armor
racial_traits.description: Lizardfolk have tough, scaly skin that provides a natural armor bonus.

racial_traits.name: Bite Attack
racial_traits.description: They possess a natural bite attack that deals damage appropriate to their size.

lizardfolk.description: Lizardfolk are robust and primal humanoids with a reptilian nature. Their natural armor and bite attack, along with their hardy constitution, make them formidable in harsh environments.

monkey_goblin.name: Monkey Goblin

racial_traits.name: Enhanced Acrobatics
racial_traits.description: Monkey goblins receive bonuses on Acrobatics checks, reflecting their nimble, simian nature.

racial_traits.name: Natural Climber
racial_traits.description: They excel at climbing and jumping, granting them exceptional agility.

monkey_goblin.description: Monkey goblins are a nimble variant of goblins that emphasize acrobatic movement and agility. Their ability to climb and jump effortlessly makes them unpredictable in combat.

orc.name: Orc

racial_traits.name: Ferocity
racial_traits.description: Orcs are known for their brutal aggression, gaining bonuses on Intimidate checks and combat maneuvers.

racial_traits.name: Natural Attack
racial_traits.description: Orcs possess a natural bite attack that can be used in combat.

orc.description: Orcs are powerful, brutish warriors with an imposing presence. Their raw strength and fierce combat style make them excellent frontline fighters.

oread.name: Oread

racial_traits.name: Stone Affinity
racial_traits.description: Oreads have an innate bond with stone, granting them bonuses on natural armor and skill checks in rocky or underground environments.

oread.description: Oreads are earth-touched humanoids with natural resilience and a strong connection to rocky environments, which aids them in survival and combat.

ratfolk.name: Ratfolk

racial_traits.name: Trapfinding
racial_traits.description: Ratfolk have a keen ability to detect traps and hidden dangers in urban or underground environments.

racial_traits.name: Cunning and Stealth
racial_traits.description: Their clever nature grants bonuses on Stealth and other Dexterity-based skills.

ratfolk.description: Ratfolk are small, clever, and resourceful, excelling in stealth and trapfinding. Their agility and sharp senses help them survive in urban and subterranean settings.

skinwalker.name: Skinwalker

racial_traits.name: Limited Shapechanging
racial_traits.description: Skinwalkers possess the innate ability to change into an animal form a limited number of times per day.

racial_traits.name: Natural Attack Adaptation
racial_traits.description: In their animal form, they gain natural attacks (such as claws or bite) appropriate to that form.

racial_traits.name: Resilient Physique
racial_traits.description: They trade mental acuity for physical prowess, reflecting their bestial nature.

skinwalker.description: Skinwalkers are humanoids with the mystical ability to shift into animal forms. Their hybrid nature grants them physical strength and natural attacks, although they sacrifice some mental finesse.

sylph.name: Sylph

racial_traits.name: Air Affinity
racial_traits.description: Sylphs have a natural connection to the elemental plane of air, granting them bonuses on Acrobatics and Stealth checks.

racial_traits.name: Graceful Movement
racial_traits.description: Their light frame allows for exceptional agility and ease of movement.

sylph.description: Sylphs are graceful and charismatic humanoids with an inherent connection to air. Their agility and charm make them excellent scouts and diplomats.

triaxian.name: Triaxian

racial_traits.name: Exotic Physiology
racial_traits.description: Triaxians have a unique, otherworldly physiology that grants them unusual resistances and occasionally bonus feats related to their alien heritage.

racial_traits.name: Adaptable Ability
racial_traits.description: They allow for customization of ability score modifiers during character creation.

triaxian.description: Triaxians are mysterious, alien-like humanoids with adaptable ability modifiers and unique racial traits that offer versatile options in character creation.

undine.name: Undine

racial_traits.name: Amphibious
racial_traits.description: Undines can breathe both air and water and gain a swim speed.

racial_traits.name: Water Affinity
racial_traits.description: They excel in aquatic environments with bonuses on Swim checks and resistance to water-based effects.

undine.description: Undines are water-dwelling humanoids with a natural affinity for aquatic environments. Their amphibious nature makes them adept in maritime or coastal adventures.

vanara.name: Vanara

racial_traits.name: Natural Climber
racial_traits.description: Vanaras are adept at climbing and receive bonuses on Climb and Acrobatics checks.

racial_traits.name: Enhanced Agility
racial_traits.description: Their simian nature grants them exceptional speed and acrobatic prowess.

racial_traits.name: Prehensile Tail
racial_traits.description: They possess a tail that can be used for minor manipulation or balance.

vanara.description: Vanaras are simian humanoids celebrated for their remarkable agility, climbing ability, and swift movement. Their natural athleticism makes them excellent scouts and combatants in rugged terrain.

barbarian.name: Barbarian
barbarian.description: Barbarians are fierce warriors who rely on raw physical power and rage to overcome foes. Their high hit points and strong melee capabilities make them effective front-line combatants.

bard.name: Bard
bard.description: Bards blend music, magic, and social skills to inspire allies and confound enemies. Their versatility allows them to support the party in multiple ways.

cleric.name: Cleric
cleric.description: Clerics are divine spellcasters who combine healing and combat prowess. Their strong connection to their deity provides them with powerful miracles and healing abilities.

druid.name: Druid
druid.description: Druids are nature-based spellcasters with the ability to transform into animals. They draw their power from the natural world and excel in wilderness survival.

fighter.name: Fighter
fighter.description: Fighters are masterful warriors who excel in combat tactics, weapon proficiency, and brute strength. Their versatility and durability make them reliable in any battle.

monk.name: Monk
monk.description: Monks combine martial arts with inner spiritual power. Their unarmed strikes, fast movement, and ability to deflect attacks make them formidable opponents.

paladin.name: Paladin
paladin.description: Paladins are holy warriors dedicated to justice and righteousness. Their divine powers allow them to heal allies and smite evil foes.

ranger.name: Ranger
ranger.description: Rangers are skilled hunters and trackers with a close bond to nature. They excel at ranged combat, wilderness survival, and adapting to different environments.

rogue.name: Rogue
rogue.description: Rogues are cunning and stealthy characters who rely on skill and precision to outmaneuver their foes. They excel in trapfinding, lockpicking, and delivering devastating sneak attacks.

sorcerer.name: Sorcerer
sorcerer.description: Sorcerers are innate spellcasters whose magical power flows from their bloodline. They cast spells spontaneously and rely on raw magical ability rather than study.

wizard.name: Wizard
wizard.description: Wizards are scholarly spellcasters who learn magic through study and careful preparation. They have access to a vast repertoire of spells and a deep understanding of arcane lore.
